Container.Description: Radarr - A fork of Sonarr to work with movies à la Couchpotato. This comes bundled with sickbeard_mp4_automator script, that can be found here: https://github.com/mdhiggins/sickbeard_mp4_automator

Config.Name: Host Port for 7878
Config.Description: Container Port: 7878

Config.Name: Host Path for /config
Config.Description: Container Path: /config

Config.Name: Host Path for /storage
Config.Description: Container Path: /storage

Config.Name: SMA Update
Config.Description: TRUE = enabled :: Update SMA on container startup

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: threads
Config.Description: FFMpeg threads, corresponds to threads parameter

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: output-format
Config.Description: Wrapped format corresponding to -f in FFmpeg

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: output-extension
Config.Description: File extension for created media

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: sort-streams
Config.Description: Sort streams by language preferences and channels

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: process-same-extensions
Config.Description: Run files with the same input and output extensions through the conversion process. Tagging is not effected. If after options are generated all streams are copy conversion will be skipped. Use with caution alongside universal audio and audio copy-original as tracks will keep replicating

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: force-convert
Config.Description: Force conversion regardless of streams being in appropriate format

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: preopts
Config.Description: Additional comma separated FFmpeg options placed before main commands

Config.Name: SMA: Converter: postopts
Config.Description: Additional comma separated FFmpeg options placed after main commands

Config.Name: SMA: Permissions: chmod
Config.Description: Base 8 chmod value

Config.Name: SMA: Metadata: relocate-moov
Config.Description: Relocate MOOV atom using QTFastStart. MP4 only

Config.Name: SMA: Metadata: tag
Config.Description: Tag files with metadata from TMDB. MP4 only

Config.Name: SMA: Metadata: tag-language
Config.Description: Tag language

Config.Name: SMA: Metadata: download-artwork
Config.Description: Download artwork and embed in media. poster, thumb, True, False are valid options

Config.Name: SMA: Metadata: preserve-source-disposition
Config.Description: Maintain disposition elements from source file, set False to have the script set defaults based on sorting and preferences

Config.Name: SMA: Video: codec
Config.Description: Approved video codecs. Codecs not on this list are converted to the first codec on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Video: bitrate
Config.Description: Maximum bitrate for video in Kb. Values above this range will be down sampled. 0 for no limit

Config.Name: SMA: Video: crf
Config.Description: CRF value, -1 to disable

Config.Name: SMA: Video: crf-profiles
Config.Description: See script website: https://github.com/mdhiggins/sickbeard_mp4_automator/wiki/AutoProcess-Settings

Config.Name: SMA: Video: max-width
Config.Description: Maximum video width, videos larger will be down sized

Config.Name: SMA: Video: profile
Config.Description: Video profile

Config.Name: SMA: Video: max-level
Config.Description: Maximum video level, videos above will be down sampled. Format example is 4.1

Config.Name: SMA: Video: pix-fmt
Config.Description: Supported pix-fmt list. Formats not on this list are be converted to the first format on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: codec
Config.Description: Approved audio codecs. Codecs not on this list are converted to the first codec on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: languages
Config.Description: Approved audio stream languages. Languages not on this list will not be used. Leave blank to approve all languages

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: default-language
Config.Description: If audio stream language is undefined, assumed this language

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: first-stream-of-language
Config.Description: Only include the first occurrence of an audio stream of language

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: channel-bitrate
Config.Description: Bitrate of audio stream per channel. Multiple by number of channels to get stream bitrate. Use 0 to attempt to guess based on source bitrate

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: max-bitrate
Config.Description: Maximum audio stream bitrate regardless of channels. 0 for no limit

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: max-channels
Config.Description: Maximum number of audio channels per stream. Streams with more channels will be down sampled

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: prefer-more-channels
Config.Description: When sorting source audio streams, prefer higher channel counts

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: default-more-channels
Config.Description: When setting default audio stream, prefer higher channel counts

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: filter
Config.Description: FFmpeg audio filter. Setting this will not allow copying audio streams

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: sample-rates
Config.Description: Approved audio sample rates, rates not on the approved list will be converted to the first rate on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: copy-original
Config.Description: Always include a copy of the original audio stream

Config.Name: SMA: Audio: ignore-truehd
Config.Description: Ignore trueHD audio streams for specific extensions (Not supported in MP4 containers). Leave blank to disable

Config.Name: SMA: Universal Audio: codec
Config.Description: Approved audio codecs. Codecs not on this list are converted to the first codec on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Universal Audio: channel-bitrate
Config.Description: Bitrate of universal audio stream per channel. Multiple by number of channels to get stream bitrate. Use 0 to attempt to guess based on source bitrate

Config.Name: SMA: Universal Audio: first-stream-only
Config.Description: Only create a universal audio stream for the first audio stream encountered

Config.Name: SMA: Universal Audio: move-after
Config.Description: Move universal audio stream after the source stream

Config.Name: SMA: Universal Audio: filter
Config.Description: FFmpeg audio filter. Setting this will not allow copying audio streams

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: codec
Config.Description: Approved subtitle codecs. Codecs not on this list are converted to the first codec on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: codec-image-based
Config.Description: Approved image-based subtitle codecs. Codecs not on this list are converted to the first codec on the list

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: languages
Config.Description: Approved subtitle stream languages. Languages not on this list will not be used. Leave blank to approve all languages

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: default-language
Config.Description: If subtitle stream language is undefined, assumed this language

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: first-stream-of-language
Config.Description: Only include the first occurrence of a subtitle stream of language

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: encoding
Config.Description: Subtitle encoding format

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: burn-subtitles
Config.Description: Burns subtitles onto video stream. Valid parameters are true / any, false, default, forced, default, forced. If a valid subtitle for burning is found this will force the video stream to be encoded (cannot copy). Internal subtitles are prioritized over external subtitles. This feature does not support image based subtitle formats

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: download-subs
Config.Description: Attempt to download subtitles of your specified languages automatically using subliminal

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: download-hearing-impaired-subs
Config.Description: Download hearing impaired subtitles using subliminal

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: download-providers
Config.Description: Subliminal providers, leave blank to use default providers

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: embed-subs
Config.Description: Embeds text based subtitles in the output video. External subtitles in the same directory will embedded. If false subtitles will be extracted

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: embed-image-subs
Config.Description: Embed image based subtitles in the output video. Ensure you are using a container that supports image based subtitles

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: embed-only-internal-subs
Config.Description: Limit embedding subtitles to only subs embedded in the source file

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: ignore-embedded-subs
Config.Description: Ignore sub streams included in source file, external sources will still be processed

Config.Name: SMA: Subtitle: attachment-codec
Config.Description: Approved codecs for attachments. Useful for fonts included with source file

Config.Name: SMA: Plex: token
Config.Description: Plex Home Token

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Container Variable: PUID

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Container Variable: PGID
